remarks: Cyclically shifting a closed walk as word of fixed length results in a closed walk as word of the same length (in an undirected graph). (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 10-Jun-2018.)
statement: clwwnisshclwwn $p |- ( ( N e. NN0 /\ W e. ( ( V ClWWalksN E ) ` N ) ) -> ( M e. ( 0 ... N ) -> ( W cyclShift M ) e. ( ( V ClWWalksN E ) ` N ) ) ) $.
